ygData.msgSnippet: Yahoo Groups service has been . . . lacking for several months. Additionally, if something should happen to me or I no longer have the time to moderate this,

Yahoo Groups service has been . . . lacking for several months.  
Additionally, if something should happen to me or I no longer have 
the time to moderate this, there is no way to appoint a new moderator 
in the absence of the group owner.

All of this has lead me to reluctantly consider the possibility of 
moving the group.

Also on the short term, reluctantly I am considering shutting down 
public access to message archives to keep spammers from harvesting 
email addresses from our messages.

I would appreciate input on these things.
